trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en popup-meny som gör att en kontroll för att exponera funktioner som är specifika för kontexten för kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ContextMenu is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, vilket innebär att den kan innehålla en samling objekt av en annan typ (till exempel sträng-, image- eller panelen).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ContextMenu class are used to define the position and behavior of the ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper för ContextMenu-klassen används för att definiera position och funktionssätt för ContextMenu.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> can have a ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>kan ha en ContextMenu.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a ContextMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Om du tilldelar en ContextMenu till den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>klassen hanterar kontexten menyn åtgärder som svar på användarinteraktion.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Part of the work the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> does is opening the ContextMenu when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control.
trans-unit.target: En del av arbetet på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>har öppnar ContextMenu när användaren klickar på höger musknapp över kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the ContextMenu and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> classes.
trans-unit.target: Följande egenskaper har definierats av ContextMenu och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both ContextMenu and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, the property value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Om någon av dessa egenskaper anges på båda ContextMenu och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, egenskapsvärdet hämtas från den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>används.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> A ContextMenu is automatically placed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A>A ContextMenu automatiskt placeras inuti en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Det här problemet kan inte ändras.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ContextMenu Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ContextMenu controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anpassa den ContextMenu kontrollen att använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera ContextMenu kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ContextMenu, see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för ContextMenu finns [ContextMenu format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ContextMenu control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i ContextMenu kontrollens standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en viss instans av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> stängs.

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: ## Dirigeras händelseinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Routningsstrategi | Genomströmning | | Delegaten | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> routade händelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should be placed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett återanrop som anger var en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> ska placeras på skärmen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>egenskapen måste anges till <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>för återanrop ombud som ska användas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>Delegera returnerar en matris med möjliga punkter som definieras med avseende på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: När snabbmenyn visas en plats väljs som maximerar mängden den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>fönster som visas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as it is for the popup.
trans-unit.target: Funktionen är samma som för popup-fönstret.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [så: Ange en anpassad Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [Popup placering exempel](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A callback that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ett återanrop som anger platsen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om kontrollen har stöd för bläddring.

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om kontrollen har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>i dess format och har en anpassad tangentbord rullning beteende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>ska returnera `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context menu appears with a dropped shadow.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om snabbmenyn ska visas med en släppt skugga.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>öppnas värdet anges till värdet för <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen `true` har ingen effekt om den <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `false`.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context menu appears with a dropped shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om snabbmenyn som visas med en släppt skugga. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Peka Get eller anger det vågräta avståndet mellan mål-ursprung och popup-justering.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan placera en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dessa egenskaper fungerar på samma sätt som de gör för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Popup placeringen](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen | ## XAML attributsyntax ``` - or – ``` ## XAML värden *dubbla* String-representation av en värde.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Det tolkas som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] mått.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strängar behöver inte uttryckligen innehålla decimaltecken.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel värdet `1` tillåts.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: Samma <xref:System.Double>intervall som anges i avsnittet egenskapsvärdet vissa begränsningar.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *dubbla* värdet som beskrivs ovan, följt av ett av följande enhet deklaration strängar: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(standard) är [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` är tum; 1 i == 96px `cm` är cm; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` är punkter; 1pt==(96/72) px **Observera** i många fall double kan vara inställd på automatisk, men en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>visas inte om förskjutningarna är inställda på att Auto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Det vågräta avståndet mellan mål-ursprung och popup justeringspunkten.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om ursprung och popup justering målpunkt finns [Popup placeringen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> är synligt.

trans-unit.source: When IsOpen is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: När IsOpen har angetts till `true`, musinfångningen anges till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>och dess underträd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> är synliga, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> händelse inträffar.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Händelsedata för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"> </xref> objekt för den här <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*> property changed.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterar att den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>egenskapen har ändrats.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Händelsedata för den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> event is raised by an object inside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"> </xref> händelse utlöses av ett objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Händelsedata för den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på den <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Händelsedata för den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> händelse inträffar.

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Händelsedata för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Called when a context menu's visual parent changes.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en snabbmeny visuell överordnad ändras.

trans-unit.source: The object that the context menu was previously attached to.
trans-unit.target: Det objekt som snabbmenyn tidigare var kopplad till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a context menu opens.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en viss instans av en snabbmeny öppnas.

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Opened"> </xref> routade händelse.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Placement property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger egenskapen placering för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>tilldelas den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>ändras värdet för den här egenskapen när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>öppnas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the mouse, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Om användaren öppnas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>med hjälp av musen placering anges till <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the keyboard, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: Om användaren öppnas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>med hjälp av tangentbordet placering anges till <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ändra placeringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>genom att ange <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen på <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan placera en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, placering av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dessa egenskaper fungerar på samma sätt som de gör för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Popup placeringen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area relative to which the context menu is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger området i förhållande till som placeras på snabbmenyn när den öppnas.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan placera en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dessa egenskaper fungerar på samma sätt som de gör för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Popup placeringen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The area that defines the rectangle that is used to position the context menu.
trans-unit.target: Det område som definierar rektangeln som används för att placera på snabbmenyn.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> relative to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> i förhållande till vilket den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> placeras när den öppnas.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property to the owning <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>har tilldelats den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>ändras värdet för den här egenskapen till den äger <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>eller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>öppnas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: To use a different <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Att använda en annan <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.target: Elementet i förhållande till vilket den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> placeras när den öppnas.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Förbereder elementet som anges för att visa det angivna objektet.

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Förbereda elementet kan innebära formatering, ange bindningar och så vidare.

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Element som används för att visa det angivna objektet.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Angivna objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should close automatically.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> ska stängas automatiskt.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the menu should stay open until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> property changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om menyn ska vara öppen tills den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>-egenskapen ändras för <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.StaysOpen*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.StaysOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Peka Get eller anger lodräta avståndet mellan mål-ursprung och popup-justering.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan placera en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dessa egenskaper fungerar på samma sätt som de gör för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Popup placeringen](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen | ## XAML attributsyntax ``` - or – ``` ## XAML värden *dubbla* String-representation av en värde.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Det tolkas som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] mått.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strängar behöver inte uttryckligen innehålla decimaltecken.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel värdet `1` tillåts.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: Samma <xref:System.Double>intervall som anges i avsnittet egenskapsvärdet vissa begränsningar.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *dubbla* värdet som beskrivs ovan, följt av ett av följande enhet deklaration strängar: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`(standard) är [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` är tum; 1 i == 96px `cm` är cm; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` är punkter; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > i många fall kan en dubbel anges automatiskt, men en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>visas inte om förskjutningarna är inställda på att Auto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: Lodräta avståndet mellan mål-ursprung och popup justeringspunkten.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om ursprung och popup justering målpunkt finns [Popup placeringen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
